enhanced_description: Yam Woon Sen is a beloved fresh and vibrant salad from central Thailand that with a pleasant kick of heat. Glass noodle salad with shrimp and ground pork. This easy recipe takes about 20 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Central Thai cuisine balances sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavors perfectly. The combination of glass noodles, shrimp, ground pork creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
